= Pysitemap branch changelog =

To see where Pycoon `pysitemap` branch is going in future releases, see the
PysitemapBranchRoadmap.

== 0.2a3 ==
2006-12-14

The programming part of 0.2 release is almost done. Documentation is still on the way.

  * Support for `<map:mount>` ([http://code.google.com/p/pycoon/issues/detail?id=17 #17])
  * Added rawegg: URI scheme ([http://code.google.com/p/pycoon/issues/detail?id=19 #19])
  * Added logging of HTTP requests on "info" logging level
    ([http://code.google.com/p/pycoon/issues/detail?id=18 #18])
  * Support for HTTP POST urlencoded parameters
  * Root sitemap addressing via cocoon:// URI
  * Minor enhancements and bug fixes

[http://pycoon.googlecode.com/svn/tags/pysitemap/0.2a3/|View tag]

== 0.2a2 ==
2006-12-10

Bug fix release.

  * Removed unnecessarily [http://effbot.org/zone/element-index.htm elementtree] dependency
  * Fixed some platform-related [http://codespeak.net/lxml/ lxml] version issues
  * Fixed bugs with downloading sources and building eggs from
    [http://cheeseshop.python.org/pypi/pycoon/ Cheese Shop]

[http://pycoon.googlecode.com/svn/tags/pysitemap/0.2a2/|View tag]

== 0.2a1 ==
2006-12-08

  * Initial release. Implemented the very basic Apache Cocoon sitemap functionality

[http://pycoon.googlecode.com/svn/tags/pysitemap/0.2a1/|View tag]
